## EventEmitter.listenerCount() method

Returns the number of listeners listening to the event named eventName.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
listenerCount(eventName: string | symbol): number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  eventName | string \| symbol |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
